extension.pqtest.config.externals.msbuil: Local path to msbuild.exe installation folder.
extension.pqtest.config.externals.nugetP: Local path to nuget.exe installation folder.
extension.pqtest.config.features.autoDet: When set to false, the SDK does not try to automatically detect connector workspaces and prompt to create a settings file.
extension.pqtest.config.features.useServ: Try the new feature using a reusable engine service host other than the command lines
Local path to PQTest installation folder.
extension.pqtest.config.pqtest.extension:
Specify connector extension source modules (.mez/.pqm).
This option can be specified more than once.
extension.pqtest.config.pqtest.queryFile: Query file containing section document or M expression (.m/.pq).
extension.pqtest.taskDefinitions.propert: Additional commandline arguments for the operation
extension.pqtest.explorer.name: Power query SDK
extension.pqtest.welcome.contents:
In order to use extension features, you need to create an Power query extension project.
[Create an extension project](command:powerquery.sdk.pqtest.CreateNewProjectCommand)
To learn more about how to create an extension, [read our docs](https://aka.ms/PowerQuerySDKDocs).
extension.pqtest.debugger.properties.pro: Absolute path to a power query file.
extension.pqtest.configurationSnippets.d: A new configuration for testing power query file a user selected.
